item.title: Dead? The digital download is barely out of its teens
item.description: Before embracing the digital media cloud, please let us embrace the promise of digital media, first, by allowing users a selection that would otherwise be unavailable.

item.title: iTunes Music to SQLite - version 0.1 beta released
item.description: iTunes Music to SQLite imports all 'Music' playlists in iTunes into a SQLite database.

item.title: Project page for iTunes Playlists to Xml now created
item.description: iTunes Playlists to Xml now has an actual project page.

item.description: Version 1.4 of iTunes Playlists to Xml is now available for download.

item.title: Know every version of iTunes installed on your machine? I do.
item.description: Installers for Windows versions of Apple software is stored in a particular directory. Clean it out, and recover space.

item.title: Backing up my iTunes library - how I do it
item.description: Information on how I back up my iTunes library, in case of future computer failure.
